description: Like a large snake, the tunnel slithers through the darkness, spiraling and twisting downward.  Soft moonlight spills in from a narrow opening, illuminating a stone shelf crudely chiseled into the western wall.

Like a large snake, the tunnel slithers through the darkness, spiraling and twisting downward.  Soft light spills in from a narrow opening, illuminating a stone shelf crudely chiseled into the western wall.
title: [Abandoned Mine, Tunnel]
